title: QT Funded 45%
description: QT Funded, based in South Africa and established in October 2023, is a CFD firm offering two program types: 2 Steps and Instant. The firm supports the MT5, cTrader and TradeLocker trading platforms and offers its 2 Steps and Instant programs on those platforms. QT Funded has a review score of 3.9 out of 5 based on 600 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Excessive Exposure: Risking more than 75% of daily/max drawdown limits.
Max Risk Rule (Instant): 2% max risk allowed.
Max Risk Rule (Funded Prime): 2.5% max risk allowed.
Max Risk Rule (Funded Ultra): 1.5% max risk allowed.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: QT Instant, Prime & Power: 1% or $100 whichever is higher | QT Ultra: 2% of the account size.
payout_policy.processing_time: Every 14 days (Prime/Instant/Ultra subsequent). QT Power: On demand.
payout_policy.details: QT Instant: 80% split every 14 days (5% min profit, 25% consistency). QT Prime: Bi-weekly 80% split (90% w/ add-on). QT Power: On demand w/ 80% split (35% consistency). QT Ultra: 80% split, 21 day first cycle then 14 days.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed between accounts personally owned by them. Copy trading or using the same strategy across accounts is NOT allowed if total allocation is $400,000 or above.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Pre-Approval for EA: Only Risk Management EAs are allowed which must go through a pre-approval process. Fully automated or self-trading EAs & bots are strictly prohibited unless approved.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: If no trading activity occurs for 30 consecutive days, the account will be breached and deleted.
firm_rules.news_trading: Evaluation: Allowed. Funded (Prime & Instant & Ultra): Restrictions of 5 minutes before or after high Impact News. QT PRIME ON-DEMAND DOES NOT have the news rule applied.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Allowed (not explicitly prohibited except for potentially specific programs, checking... 'ThinkCapital Dual Step Intraday prohibited
forbidden_strategies: Excessive Exposure: Risking more than 75% of daily/max drawdown limits.
Max Risk Rule (Instant): 2% max risk allowed.
Max Risk Rule (Funded Prime): 2.5% max risk allowed.
Max Risk Rule (Funded Ultra): 1.5% max risk allowed.

seo_content:
QT Funded Technical Infrastructure

QT Funded, based in South Africa and established in October 2023, is a CFD firm offering two program types: 2 Steps and Instant. The firm supports the MT5, cTrader and TradeLocker trading platforms and offers its 2 Steps and Instant programs on those platforms. QT Funded has a review score of 3.9 out of 5 based on 600 reviews.
